meta.title: Professional Shooting Training in Cyprus | Expert Firearms Instruction
meta.description: Expert firearms training in Cyprus for all skill levels. Learn from certified professionals in a safe, controlled environment. Personalized instruction and flexible scheduling available.

hero.title: Professional Shooting Training in Cyprus
hero.subtitle: Special programs for beginners and individuals who want to test their shooting talent. Training in safe weapon handling and assistance in shooting moving targets.

certifiedInstructor.title: Certified Instructor
certifiedInstructor.description: Professional training from a certified expert with years of experience

personalizedApproach.title: Personalized Approach
personalizedApproach.description: Training programs tailored to your skill level and goals

smallGroups.title: Small Group Sessions
smallGroups.description: Individual attention in a comfortable learning environment

flexibleSchedule.title: Flexible Schedule
flexibleSchedule.description: Training sessions that fit your busy lifestyle

beginner.title: Beginner Course
beginner.description: Perfect for those new to shooting. This comprehensive course covers all the fundamentals of firearm safety and basic marksmanship. You'll learn in a controlled, supportive environment with personalized attention.

intermediate.title: Intermediate Training
intermediate.description: Designed for shooters who have mastered the basics and want to enhance their skills. This program focuses on advanced techniques and practical applications, helping you become a more confident and capable shooter.

advanced.title: Advanced Program
advanced.description: For experienced shooters looking to reach peak performance. This intensive program covers complex scenarios, competition-level techniques, and mental training to help you achieve mastery in your shooting discipline.

trainer.title: Expert Training by Renos Charalampous
trainer.description: With over 15 years of experience in professional shooting instruction and multiple international certifications, your training is in expert hands.

testimonials.title: What Our Students Say
testimonials.subtitle: Read about the experiences of our students

reviews.text: The personalized attention and expert guidance helped me develop proper technique from day one. Highly recommended!
reviews.author: Michael S.

reviews.text: As a competitive shooter, the advanced training program took my performance to the next level. The results speak for themselves.
reviews.author: Sarah L.

reviews.text: The instructor's patience and knowledge made learning enjoyable and effective. I'm now much more confident in my abilities.
reviews.author: David R.

reviews.text: Outstanding training facility with top-notch instruction. The advanced drills really pushed my skills forward.
reviews.author: Emma K.

reviews.text: Professional, safety-focused, and extremely knowledgeable. Best firearms training I've ever received.
reviews.author: James M.

reviews.text: The structured progression from basics to advanced techniques was perfect. Worth every penny!
reviews.author: Alexandra P.

form.name: Name

calendar.noSlots: No available time slots for this date

consent.text: I agree to the processing of my personal data for the purpose of scheduling training sessions. I understand that my data will be handled in accordance with the privacy policy and that I can withdraw my consent at any time. I also confirm that I am at least 18 years old or have parental consent.
consent.privacy: By scheduling a training session, you acknowledge that you have read and agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy. Your data will be used solely for training coordination purposes.

confirmation.title: Confirm Training Request
confirmation.text: You are about to request a training session for:
confirmation.check: Please confirm that these details are correct.

form.success: Your training request has been submitted. We'll contact you soon!
form.error: There was an error submitting your request. Please try again.
